text: pumiyil (valntu ponavarkalukkup pinnal), atanai varicakap perra ivarkalaiyum, nam natinal, ivarkalutaiya pavankalin karanattal (avvare) tantippom enpatu ivarkalukku telivakavillaiya? Nam ivarkalutaiya itayankalin mitu muttiraiyittu vittom; enave ivarkal (narpotanaikalukkuc) cevicaykka mattarkal
